channel.title: 639 Dementhium, a few questions
channel.description:
Alright, I'm pretty new to Dementhium sources, or any 600+ sources for that matter, these are the only things I have had troubles with.
1. I'm having some trouble with NPC attack area, they'll attack outside of their room, or if it's a multi-combat zone you'll have any NPC spawned in that area attacking you. If someone could maybe point my in the right direction on what I should be looking for to change this, that would be great, I'm not looking to remove the multi-combat zone or make the NPC not aggressive, just reduce the distance that it will attack.
2. How does this Tick system work, when I last tried to use it I would get an error saying, something like Class name is not abstract does not override abstract method execute(); and does not override or implement a method from a supertype. Any thoughts? Never seen this before, and I sort of understand what it's telling me, I just can't figure out how I would fix it.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: 639 Dementhium, a few questions
item.dc:creator: @musicmasta musicmasta
item.description:
@musicmasta wrote:

Alright, I’m pretty new to Dementhium sources, or any 600+ sources for that matter, these are the only things I have had troubles with.

  1. I’m having some trouble with NPC attack area, they’ll attack outside of their room, or if it’s a multi-combat zone you’ll have any NPC spawned in that area attacking you. If someone could maybe point my in the right direction on what I should be looking for to change this, that would be great, I’m not looking to remove the multi-combat zone or make the NPC not aggressive, just reduce the distance that it will attack.

  2. How does this Tick system work, when I last tried to use it I would get an error saying, something like Class name is not abstract does not override abstract method execute(); and does not override or implement a method from a supertype. Any thoughts? Never seen this before, and I sort of understand what it’s telling me, I just can’t figure out how I would fix it.

Thanks in advance.
